sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>leader</radical> has <radical>two</radical> things that remind him of his <kanji>humanity</kanji>: his shoes, and his hat. These two things remind the leader of his humanity because humans are the only ones who wear shoes and hats.
meaningInfo: Reflect upon your own humanity. What does it mean to be human? Is it wearing shoes and hats? Probably.
readingMnemonic: Another thing that reminds you and the leader about your <kanji>humanity</kanji> is wearing <reading>jean</reading>s (<ja>じん</ja>). Jeans are the go-to legwear for many people, and no one but humans wear them. Jeans are another great symbol of humanity.
readingInfo: Are you wearing jeans right now? If so, rub them with your hands and say aloud “Oh, the humanity!” Or just imagine wearing jeans if you aren’t actually wearing them.
